name: DSB Pro
description:
Here you have a dog, a skateboard, lots of balls and 60 seconds time.

Let your dog jump and catch as many balls as possible!

Improve your skateboard, jump higher and higher!!
Boost your high score!!
Collect deck stickers, pennants and style your skateboard!
With the skateboard editor you can create
over 1 million different designs!

Dog Skate Battle Pro is a fast-paced 1 minute action skill game for anyone who likes dogs.
